1. City Council

City Council
============

* 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month
* City Council Chamber
  George A. Purefoy Municipal Center
  6101 Frisco Square Blvd.
  Frisco, TX 75034

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. You can watch City Council meetings live, as well as view videos from past meetings.
View All Agendas, Minutes, and Videos


![250811_Frisco_City_Council_grouppix.5x7jpg](https://www.friscotexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=38391)

***All members serve at-large and represent all of Frisco.***
